appId.description: Application ID set in the spark configuration of the current context. Its format depends on the resource manager.

appName.description: App name set in the spark configuration of the current context. It may be provided by the user.

batchId.description: Populated only for Dataproc serverless batches. The resource id of the batch.

batchUuid.description: Populated only for Dataproc serverless batches. A UUID generated by the service when it creates the batch.

clusterName.description: Populated only for Dataproc GCE workloads. The cluster name is unique within a GCP project.

clusterUuid.description: Populated only for Dataproc GCE workloads. A UUID generated by the service at the time of cluster creation.

jobId.description: Populated only for Dataproc GCE workloads. If not specified by the user, the job ID will be provided by the service.

jobUuid.description: Populated only for Dataproc GCE workloads. A UUID that uniquely identifies a job within the project over time.

projectId.description: The GCP project ID that the resource belongs to.

queryNodeName.description: The name of the query node in the executed Spark Plan. Often used to describe the command being executed.

sessionId.description: Populated only for Dataproc serverless interactive sessions. The resource id of the session, used for URL generation.

sessionUuid.description: Populated only for Dataproc serverless interactive sessions. A UUID generated by the service when it creates the session.
